title: Fastest Way to LvL a Smurf
body: Anyone Know whats the fastest way to lvl a smurf from lvl 15 plus

replies.body:
always int bots. as long as you do an average of 14 minute games...
also its a good idea to use your 2 hours of custom. since they give decent xp too. just find some people who are willing to do a stall game that goes on for ages...and make sure you win. not sure if the xp per minute is worth it tho, but im sure the IP per effort is. lol.
